negatives.title: High Immediate Risk
negatives.description: Your risk for a heart attack or stroke is high, right now. This isn't a problem for 'later.' Your smoking, 41-inch waist, and severe lipid numbers are a dangerous combination.

positives.title: Proven Resilience
positives.description: Your body is strong. Your blood sugar and kidney function are perfect. You have proven you can recover.

positives.title: Fast Liver Healing
positives.description: Your 2023-2024 labs show that when you make changes, your liver heals fast (your GGT dropped from 289 to 146!).

riskAnalysis.title: Your Clinical Assessment: Connecting the Dots
riskAnalysis.summary: Your lab report tells a clear story. These three factors are driving your severe heart attack risk.

riskFactors.title: High Visceral Fat (Belly Fat)
riskFactors.summary: This isn't just 'weight.' It's visceral fat packed around your organs. This fat is an active, 'angry' organ itself, pumping out inflammatory signals.

riskFactors.title: High Blood Fat (Triglycerides)
riskFactors.summary: This is pure, unburned fuel (fat) circulating in your blood. Your body has no chance to burn it, so it stores it as visceral fat and clogs your arteries.
causes: Large, late-night carb meals (e.g., 10 PM plate of dal rice)

riskFactors.title: Severe Liver Stress
riskFactors.summary: This is your liver's alarm bell, ringing at over 3.5 times the normal level. It's a direct sign of toxicity.
causes: Weekend alcohol use on an already-stressed liver

actionPlan.title: Our 30-Day 'Bootcamp' Strategy
actionPlan.summary: We will attack your risks on four fronts simultaneously. This is a 30-day plan to break old habits and build new ones. It is a prescription.

focusAreas.title: Diet
focusAreas.goal: Fix meal content and timing to stop fueling fat storage.
rules: Implement a structured meal plan (high protein/fiber).

focusAreas.title: Exercise
rules: Add structure to your cardio for stamina (beyond just walking).
Introduce strength training to build muscle.

focusAreas.title: Alcohol
focusAreas.reason: Your GGT of 185 is a medical warning. Your liver must heal.

focusAreas.title: Smoking
focusAreas.goal: Allow your heart and lungs to heal.

supplementPrescription.title: Immediate Supplementation
supplementPrescription.summary: Your new labs show severe deficiencies. Start these today.

prescriptions.title: Vitamin D3 (60,000 IU)
prescriptions.dosage: One sachet, once per week (e.g., every Sunday).

prescriptions.title: Vitamin B12 (1500 mcg)
prescriptions.instructions: Take for 30 days. This deficiency can cause fatigue.

prescriptions.title: Omega-3 Fish Oil
prescriptions.dosage: At least 1000mg of (EPA + DHA) combined, daily.

motivationalSummary.title: Your Path Forward
motivationalSummary.primaryMessage: Narender, these numbers are not a life sentence. They are a warning. Your body is screaming for a change.
motivationalSummary.proofOfSuccess: You have already proven you can do this. Your GGT dropped from 289 to 146 between 2023 and 2024. That is a phenomenal recovery. You just didn't have the full plan to make it stick. Now you do.
motivationalSummary.nextSteps: This 30-day plan is your new blueprint. It's aggressive because your risk is aggressive. It will feel hard for the first week, but by Week 4, you will feel different.
motivationalSummary.closingThought: You have a strong heart and healthy metabolism waiting to be unburied. Let's get to work.
